name: Doyen Autos Logo Resources
description: Official logo assets for Doyen Autos in various sizes and formats

usage.favicon: Use favicon-16x16.png and favicon-32x32.png for browser tab icons
usage.mobile: Use android-chrome-192x192.png, android-chrome-512x512.png, and apple-touch-icon.png for mobile devices
usage.general: Use logo-48.png for small UI elements, logo-96.png for standard display, logo-144.png for high-DPI displays, and logo-512.png for large displays or printing
